cms.query.QueryText: SELECT ##TOPN## ##COLUMNS## FROM ( SELECT CMS_Role.*, CMS_UserRole.ValidTo FROM CMS_Role INNER JOIN CMS_UserRole ON CMS_UserRole.RoleID = CMS_Role.RoleID WHERE UserID = @UserID UNION ALL SELECT CMS_Role.*, CMS_MembershipUser.ValidTo FROM CMS_Role INNER JOIN CMS_MembershipRole ON CMS_MembershipRole.RoleID = CMS_Role.RoleID INNER JOIN CMS_MembershipUser ON CMS_MembershipUser.MembershipID = CMS_MembershipRole.MembershipID WHERE UserID = @UserID UNION ALL SELECT CMS_Role.*, NULL FROM CMS_Role WHERE RoleName IN (##GENERICROLES##) ) AS X WHERE ##WHERE## ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##
